about_the_game:
Game Features

  • Deck Building: Construct your own unique deck freely to create a personalized battle style

  • Strategic Combat: Engage in deep tactical battles and savor the thrill of intellectual challenges

  • Team Collaboration: Connect with like-minded allies and showcase the power of teamwork

  • Fast-Paced Matches: Each battle is quick and engaging, perfect for enjoying combat in your spare time

  • Free Trading: Trade unique cards freely, fully embracing the joy of collection

Class Overview

  • Mage: Devoted to studying magical energies, skilled in dealing area damage and controlling enemy troops

  • Priest: A devoted follower who employs powerful healing and defensive spells to protect allies, while invoking the Holy Light to burn enemies

  • Ranger: With keen instincts and agile movements, capable of inflicting direct damage on enemy heroes, while their card control skills pose a significant threat to foes

  • Warrior: The embodiment of strength, courage, and conviction, enhancing the attack capabilities of allies while delivering direct damage to enemies with various skills

short_description: A classic turn-based strategy card game that allows players to collect various creature cards and skill cards through quests, upgrades, and trading. Players can select their favorite cards to craft a unique deck for battles, immersing themselves in the excitement of strategic gameplay!
